Auckland to Sydney | Carnival Cruise Lines | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Auckland to Sydney 5 Days | Auckland to Sydney Includes onboard credit of AUD200 per cabin plus Reduced deposit Book by 30 November 2025 Deal Details Travel Dates 21 May 27 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $710 per person Enquire Now Bonus Includes onboard credit of AUD200 per cabin plus Reduced deposit Book by 30 November 2025 Description Start your journey in Auckland, New Zealand, the stunning “City of Sails,” and set sail in style amid views of the city’s volcanic cones and scenic waterfront. Step aboard your Carnival ship and prepare for days filled with fun, relaxation, and endless activities. Spend Days 2–4 at sea exploring everything the ship offers — from world-class dining, specialty restaurants, and six meals a day, to live shows, comedy, bars, clubs, and deck parties. Lounge by the pools, soak in the hot tubs, stay active in the fitness center, or unwind in the Adults-Only Retreat. Whether you want excitement or relaxation, the ship has something for everyone. On Day 5, arrive in Sydney, where the Harbour Bridge and Sydney Opera House provide iconic backdrops for your arrival or departure. From vibrant cities to relaxing sea days, this cruise blends adventure, comfort, and entertainment for the ultimate getaway. Pricing 4 Nights in an Interior Stateroom (Cat 4A) from $756* per person, twin share 4 Nights in an Oceanview Stateroom (Cat 6A) from $949* per person, twin share 4 Nights in a Balcony Stateroom (Cat 8A) from $1052* per person, twin share What's Included A variety of room types, with options to sleep up to 5 people per room Stateroom attendant and daily turn-down service Great options for all six meals — breakfast, brunch, lunch, afternoon tea, dinner and late-night, that is — at the full-service Main Dining Room or the casual Lido Restaurant Specialty food spots for breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacking Lemonade, iced tea, hot chocolate, non-bottled water and non-specialty coffee and tea Amazing stage shows, live musical performances, stand-up comedy and more Clubs, bars and lounges featuring DJs spinning, karaoke, piano sing-alongs and more Deck parties, game shows, trivia contests and more fun ways to get involved A fully-stocked fitness center, plus outdoor sports activities Pools and hot tubs for all, plus an Adults-Only Retreat Itinerary Day 1 Auckland Day 2 Fun Day at Sea Day 3 Fun Day at Sea Day 4 Fun Day at Sea Day 5 Sydney Your Ship - Carnival Adventure Offering 13 decks and a world of fun at your fingertips, Carnival Adventure is perfect for families, couples and groups of friends who are looking to experience it all. Sailing from Sydney, plus select cruises from Melbourne and Singapore, Carnival Adventure has a huge variety of activities on board, including exciting waterslides, four relaxing pools, a thrilling Edge Adventure Park, plus a huge range of bars, entertainment and dining options. You might start your day at the waterslides, or Edge, complete with ziplining, rock climbing and abseiling. Then enjoy a lazy morning poolside, followed by a delicious family lunch. Or, how about a relaxing massage at the day spa while the kids have the time of their lives in the kids clubs? Throw delicious dining at Luke’s Bar & Grill, great bars, and world-class entertainment into the mix and you’ve got yourself a holiday lineup that can only be described as an adventure — a Carnival Adventure. We can’t wait to welcome you onboard! Terms & Conditions Pricing is based on Choice Plus Fares: Offer applies to cabin assignment categories. Non-refundable reduced deposit per person. Offer includes non-refundable onboard credit per cabin. Deposit is non-refundable. Offer ends on November 30, 2025 11:59 PM AEDT. Bookings made as part of a group will include their amenities. Cruise rates are in New Zealand Dollar, average per person and based on double occupancy. Offer is capacity controlled and is not combinable with any other discount or promotional offer. Rates may vary by ship, stateroom type and sail date. Change fees are not assessed outside of the final payment window. Category restrictions and exclusions apply. Carnival reserves the right to withdraw and/or change offer at any time without prior notice. Ships' Registry: The Bahamas and Panama. Experience the world differently.
